Start your application easily with Kites Framework!

  • Checkout @kites/spa template at https://github.com/vunb/kites-spa
  • Or go to /about page!
Quick guide:
  1. Install kites cli: npm install @kites/cli -g
  2. Create a project: kites spa new-project
  3. Install dependencies: npm install
  4. Start spa server: npm start
  5. Finally open brower: http://localhost:8889 or add more your own code to the new-project

Created @kites by vunb. Follow me at https://github.com/vunb
